Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires all edible cannabis products be packaged in child resistant packaging
Summary: Prohibits all registered organizations, licensees, or permittees or other entities under the jurisdiction of the cannabis board from selling or delivering any edible cannabis products not in child resistant packaging.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to requiring all edible cannabis products be packaged in child resistant packaging
